content:
The chunk pertains to application-level configuration and resource references within an AndroidManifest.xml file, specifically detailing attributes such as versioning information (versionCode, versionName), application theme, RTL support, and other app-specific settings. These are typically found in the <application> element within the overall Android manifest structure.

```<context>
The chunk is part of the <application> element in an AndroidManifest.xml file, containing configuration attributes related to application metadata such as versioning, themes, and runtime features.
</context>
```

'stateNotNeeded': bool_resource(0x1010016),
    'supportsRtl': bool_resource(0x010103af),
    'supportsUploading': bool_resource(0x101029b),
    'targetSandboxVersion': int_resource(0x101054c),
    'targetSdkVersion': int_resource(0x1010270),
    'theme': ref_resource(0x01010000),
    'value': str_resource(0x1010024),
    'versionCode': int_resource(0x101021b),
    'versionName': str_resource(0x101021c),
}
